page.title: 14HEALTH IN CRUWYS MORCHARD
page.content: Good clean air is one of the many assets when living in the Devon countryside and with less stress in everyday life, people live to a greater age. Certain houses and farms still have well-water and septic tanks. Mains water and sewerage have only been available for the past few years. There are no doctors, dentists, chiropodists, opticians or clinics in the area, the nearest being: doctors' surgeries:Cheriton Fitzpaine (7km) Witheridge (6km)-both dispense prescriptions, Tiverton (10km)-two group practices, three chemists shops. dentists, opticians, chiropodists: Tiverton, Crediton, South Molton. Clinics are at Witheridge and Tiverton and a playgroup at Cadeleigh. Tiverton District Hospital takes some cases and Exeter is the centre for major surgery
